description: HTML source code for a web-based database browser interface with embedded CSS and JavaScript for fetching and displaying databases, tables, and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets current selections, and updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data from a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for table data and inserts it into the DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, providing expandability for long text or objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Enables expanding or collapsing cell content for long strings or objects.
